channel.title: No one has helped me!
channel.description: ok there was a guy named The Guardian....he made a walkthrough that tells you how to make your server and code it,which can be found here>> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,134771.0.html anyways i followed it and it says when you click runserver.bat it should say "Starting pimpscape on 0.0.0.0 43594....mine says 5555...then it says to type in localhost for the server on mopar, so i do this and it says error connecting to server must be down....i think the whole 5555 thing may be the prob. if its not then can someone tell me what the prob is and how to fix it? TY

item.title: No one has helped me!
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

If you wish to change your port , follow this :

[quote=“spon80”]first go into server.java and search for somthing like this

public static int serverlistenerPort = 5555;

then change 5555 to 43594 complie,and run.
and u dont really need to fix this insted on using port 43594 u go into (on mopar) file. port. then type in 5555.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: No one has helped me!
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

Ya rofl… er probally new to mopar… o well just go into file, port, and do 5555 and yer all good!!!

Read full topic

item.title: No one has helped me!
item.dc:creator: @1def 1def
item.description:
@1def wrote:

ya eaxactly wat wildy said man. ya u might of downloaded a diff pimpscape or sumthin. if ur port says 5555 then put in 5555 not 43594. and put the ip as 0.0.0.0 but like wildy said thats not ur ip to ur server

Read full topic

item.title: No one has helped me!
item.dc:creator: @Wildy321 Wildy321
item.description:
@Wildy321 wrote:

well wen it says “starting pimpscape at 0.0.0.0:5555” that doesnt mean you server ip is 0.0.0.0 basically it mean that the server has started up on your computer. The ip of your server is the ip of your computer.

If you do that and it still doesnt work, then you probably didnt forward your port

Read full topic

item.title: No one has helped me!

item.description:

ok there was a guy named The Guardian…he made a walkthrough that tells you how to make your server and code it,which can be found here>> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,134771.0.html anyways i followed it and it says when you click runserver.bat it should say "Starting pimpscape on 0.0.0.0 43594…mine says 5555…then it says to type in localhost for the server on mopar, so i do this and it says error connecting to server must be down…i think the whole 5555 thing may be the prob. if its not then can someone tell me what the prob is and how to fix it? TY
